content: अहुत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not sacrificed or offered (as an oblation); <ls>Ms. 12. 68.</ls> {@--2@} One who has not yet received any oblation. --तः Religious meditation, prayer, and the study of the Vedas (considered as one of the five great Yajñas and necessary duties); अहुतं च हुतं चैव तथा प्रहुतमेव च . ब्राह्मं हुतं प्राशितं च पंचयज्ञान् प्रचक्षते .. <ls>Ms. 3. 73</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">74.</ls>
